item.title: Robert Diab
item.description: I am an associate professor in the Faculty of Law at Thompson Rivers University in Kamloops, British Columbia, and a practicing lawyer. I write about a range of issues in law and technology. Some of them can be found here in shorter essays and scholarship on topics that include internet governance, compelled decryption, and digital privacy. I have also written about national security, human rights, and civil liberties. (A full list of publications is here.
